public boolean moveAndEndActivePlayerTurn(Location from,
                                          Location to)
                                   throws IllegalMoveException,
                                          PieceNeedsToBeReplacedException
Move a piece from one location to another location PostCondition: (1) the active player is now the inactive player and vice versa

Parameters:
from - Location that the piece is in before moving
to - Location to move piece to
Returns:
return true if a piece was moved and turn ended successfully
Throws:
IllegalMoveException

public boolean endActivePlayerTurn()

Throws:
IllegalMoveException

Parameters:
loc - the loc to place the piece
